scripts.build: vite build && rm dist/vuwi.es.js && mv dist/style.css dist/vuwi.css
scripts.build:local: rm -f vuwi-theme-$npm_package_version.tgz && pnpm build && npm pack && mkdir -p ~/local_modules && rm -rf ~/local_modules/vuwi-theme-$npm_package_version.tgz && cp vuwi-theme-$npm_package_version.tgz ~/local_modules/vuwi-theme.tgz
